data.title: Haim Saban Repurchases ‘Power Rangers’ From Disney
data.meta_description: Haim Saban acquired the “Power Rangers” children’s show from Walt Disney Co. for an undisclosed amount, reuniting the Los Angeles-based media investor with the television brand that made him a billionaire.
data.text:
Haim Saban acquired the “Power Rangers” children’s show from Walt Disney Co. for an undisclosed amount, reuniting the Los Angeles-based media investor with the television brand that made him a billionaire.

The deal includes worldwide rights to more than 700 episodes produced over 17 years, Los Angeles-based Saban Capital Group said today in a statement.
